#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,a,b,c;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        scanf("%d %d %d",&a,&b,&c);
        int msb=9,lsb;
        int flag=0;
        while(msb>=1&&flag==0)
        {
            lsb=9;
            while(lsb>=0&&flag==0)
            {
              int temp=(msb*10000)+(a*1000)+(b*100)+(c*10)+lsb;
              if(temp%n==0)
              {
                flag=1;
                printf("%d %d %d\n",msb,lsb,temp/n);
              }
              lsb--;
            }
            msb--;
        }
        if(msb==0)
            printf("0\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
